title: Can you tell me if this is intended or not? Illaoi's E reflection formulas
body:
First of all when i say damage reduction i mean damage reduction of the vessel (vessel and spirit can have different armor/mr values). This is what i found:

1. If your reflected damage (based on E's ratio) is higher than "spirit's current hp*****damage reduction" you will reflect damage based on "spirit's current hp*****damage reduction".
2. Otherwise you will reflect damage based on your E's ratio.

TLDR: Reflected damage in excess of the Spirit's current health (including resistances) is not redirected.

PS: I placed it in the bug reports but it got deleted by riot รง.รง, and they told me to post it in the support section. Maybe it's because i forgot the "This is what i found" part. Anyway can you tell me? After this i may repost it in the bug section

replies.body: As an Illaoi main, I feel a bit ashamed to say I'm not actually sure what the *intended* result is. I feel like it should be redirecting any excessive damage as well, but I haven't had a hard answer from anyone just yet. Feel free to repost this back in Report a Bug if you think it's not working correctly!
